hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\purpleD5$ tens and $\purpleD7$ ones so, our first addend is $\purpleD{57}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/879e33dd74c81258a910bf5222295de919d8464a)

Our second set of blocks shows $\maroonD1$ ten and $\maroonD4$ ones so, our second addend is $\maroonD{14}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/0608e105263bfbef1711b27b56d0cab2593e8118)

Our sum shows $7$ tens and $1$ one, or $71$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/a53c1b6eb7e82883390fe2b205dfa22976822b50)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$\purpleD{57} + \maroonD{14} =71$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/6030d42775e6caf621a59e03b96ffa036b6941f1)

[[☃ radio 1]]
